xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes for Financial Results 1. Other income includes Gain/(loss) on sale of property, plant and equipment . Notes for Cash Flow Cash flows from operating activities 1. Adjustments for finance costs- This item includes Finance and other income, net of finance costs . 2. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets - This item includes decrease (increase) in both Current and Non-current Other Assets. 3. Adjustments for other financial assets, current - This item includes decrease (increase) in “Unbilled receivables” and “Contract assets”. 4. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current - This item includes increase (decrease) in “Trade payables, other liabilities and provisions”. 5. Adjustments for other current liabilities - This item includes increase (decrease) in “Contract liabilities”. 6. Adjustments for unrealized foreign exchange gains losses includes Unrealised exchange (gain)/loss, exchange (gain)/loss on borrowings and loans to subsidiaries . 7. Other adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) - This item includes “Gain on sale of property, plant and equipment, net”. Cash flows from financing activities 8. Other inflows (outflows) of cash includes - This item includes “Payment for buyback of shares, including tax and transaction cost”.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOtherExpenses: Software license expense for internal use
Software license expense for internal use
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: 1. Property, plant and equipment includes “Property, plant and equipment” and “Right-of-Use assets”. 2. Other non-current assets – includes “Non-current tax assets (net)” and “Other non-current assets”. 3. Other non-current financial assets – includes non-current “Derivative assets” and “Other financial assets”. 4. Other current financial assets- includes “Derivative assets”, “Unbilled receivables” and “Other financial assets”. 5. Other current assets - includes “Contract assets” and “Other current assets”. 6. Other non-current financial liabilities – includes non-current “Lease liabilities”, “Other financial liabilities” and “Derivative liabilities”. 7. Other non-current liabilities – includes “Non-current tax liabilities (net)” and “Other non-current liabilities”. 8. Other current financial liabilities – includes “Derivative liabilities”, “Lease liabilities” and “Other financial liabilities”. 9. Other current liabilities – includes “Contract liabilities” and “Other current liabilities”.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillNotB: Re-measurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
Re-measurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillBeRe: Net change in time value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in intrinsic value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of forward contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of investment in debt instruments measured at fair value through OCI

Net change in intrinsic value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of forward contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of investment in debt instruments measured at fair value through OCI
